A recurrent neural network model

model_rnn.Rd

TODO: get rid off fwd_input_size etc.? Compare with other applications

model_rnn(
  layer = nn_gru,
  input_size,
  hidden_size,
  h,
  num_layers = 1,
  dropout = 0,
  output_activation = nn_linear(hidden_size, 1)
)

Arguments

forward_layer

(nn_module_generator or nn_module) A module with forward recurrent layer. Default: nn_gru
backward_layer

(nn_module) A module with backward recurrent layer. Default: NULL
fwd_input_size

(numeric) Input size for the forward recurrent layer
fwd_output_size

(numeric) Forward layer size (in other words: the forward layer output size)
bwd_input_size

(numeric) Input size for the backward recurrent layer
bwd_output_size

(numeric) Backward layer size (in other words: the forward layer output size)
output_size

(numeric) Output size of the whole neural network. Default: 1
final_activation

The final activation function
num_embeddings

Dictionary sizes for the particular features
embedding_dim

Starting from the simpliest example

Examples
